hesml.taxonomy.impl

Class TaxonomyCSVWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • hesml.taxonomy.impl.TaxonomyCSVWriter

  • class TaxonomyCSVWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class writes the taxonomy information into a CSV file. The class is used to generate all the files in the WNSimRep replications dataset detailed in the paper below. Lastra-Díaz, J. J., and García-Serrano, A. (2015). A new evaluation of Information Content models and ontology-based similarity measures in WordNet with a framework for their exact replication. Knowledge-Based Systems. Submitted for Publication.
    Author:
    Juan Lastra-Díaz
